name: Adapp Solutions
overview:
Even as the online advertising industry continues to grow, too many participants are forced to use software that doesn’t match up to the quality of their business. Adapp - made up of a core team of highly successful former affiliate marketers - was founded on the simple idea that giving ad network managers and affiliates themselves complete control over every aspect of their application was the best approach.

Years in the making, our proprietary white-label software is flexible and dependable, and provides for complete customization of user interface and branding. With no startup costs or monthly fees, we provide an ideal platform for motivated advertising networks who want to provide their affiliates with a custom user experience and build the value of their brand. Based out of Seattle, Adapp’s team of advertising, programming and design experts, with years of experience in the affiliate marketing industry, are determined to create the best suite of tools for online advertising.
